content:
You're right—let’s lock in the **Knowledge Vault** structure before we input sample data.

---

### **📌 Knowledge Vault Table - Column Review & Validation**
Below is a detailed **column-by-column review** with notes on what is required, best practices, and any open questions.

| **Column Name**          | **Type**           | **Required?** | **Notes** |
|--------------------------|-------------------|--------------|----------|
| **Name**                 | Text              | ✅ **Required** | The title of the stored knowledge item. |
| **Tags**                 | Multi-Select      | ✅ **Required** | Categorization for better indexing and retrieval. |
| **Origin**               | Multi-Select      | ✅ **Required** | Where this knowledge came from (Research, Mentor, ChatGPT, Book, etc.). |
| **Description**          | Text              | ✅ **Required** | Summary of the knowledge stored in this entry. |
| **Publication Date**     | Date              | ❌ Optional | Useful for tracking when a piece of knowledge was created/released. |
| **Files & Media**        | Files & Media     | ❌ Optional | Uploads like PDFs, research papers, transcripts, etc. |
| **Relevance to Jesse**   | Select (High/Med/Low) | ✅ **Required** | Helps determine priority when retrieving insights. |
| **Deep Research Available** | Checkbox      | ❌ Optional | Marks if additional deep research is available on this topic. |
| **Referenced by AI Workflows** | Relation (1-Way) → AI Workflows | ❌ Optional | Links to workflows using this knowledge. |
| **Referenced in AI Research** | Relation (2-Way) → AI Research | ❌ Optional | Links to research items that reference this knowledge. |

---

### **📌 Final Review Before Entering Sample Data**
1. **Does every required column exist?** ✅ Yes.
2. **Are any required columns missing?** ❌ No.
3. **Are all relations correctly structured?** ✅ Verified.

---

**🚀 Next Step:** If everything looks correct, I’ll generate the **sample data**, and we’ll input it into Notion. **Let me know if you approve this structure or if anything needs tweaking before moving forward!**
